radiographic_examinations.findings: An infiltrate in the right lower lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On hospital day 6, repeat chest radiography showed progression to diffuse air-space opacities. On hospital day 8, single-view chest radiography revealed worsening bilateral opacities.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral ground-glass opacities, bilateral small effusions, and right hilar and subcarinal lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On hospital day 14, repeat CT showed progression of previous areas of ground-glass opacity into areas of dense consolidation as well as worsening bilateral effusions.
